title: Turn off Ornn's forge menu?
body:
Did a quick search of the forums, didn't easily see an answer, I haven't been keeping up on the releases about him. 

I want to shut off the 5 suggested items, just dont want the screen space taken up. 
Is there a way to do it? or do I just have to deal with it?

replies.body: Ayyyyyyy y'know I was just thinking about this myself a bit ago. I don't know if the devs are currently working on a way to disable that menu, but I'll certainly pass this suggestion along!

Another little tidbit, that menu will automatically go away anytime Ornn is in combat since he's not able to forge during combat anyway. I'll still be poking the devs to see what their thoughts are on getting this option made.
Better than the menu, just a small forge button instead will be a good trade since those 5 item aren't even the only one you can forge

I would want same option. Sugestions at his menu are just dumb. Everyone uses the shop menu anyway.
{{champion:31}}
